message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CL, cs.MM

The paper addresses the task of zero-shot image classification, which is a problem in computer vision (cs.CV). The proposed approach involves formulating semantic embedding as a metric learning problem, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG). The approach also involves accurate attribute prediction, which is a problem in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and natural language processing (cs.CL). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on four challenging datasets, which is a common practice in multimedia (cs.MM).
